Stop-loss strategy: Trailing stop loss with a 10% threshold, triggered by a decline in stock price below the 50-day moving average or a significant decline in quarterly earnings.
Trailing stop loss with a 10% drop from the highest price since buying, or if the stock price falls below the 50-day moving average.
Trailing stop loss strategy, sell when price falls below 270 NTD or when ROE falls below 18%
